title: Obama Visits The White House & Everyone Ignores Joe | Daily Best of April 6 | Rick & Bubba
description:
Barack Obama returned to the White House for the first time since 2017 and everyone ignores Joe Biden, the actual sitting President. And while Democrats celebrate Obamacare, we have to ask, why are drugs like insulin still so expensive if Obamacare was supposed to fix all that? Rep. Madison Cawthorn and North Carolina Lt. Gov. Mark Robinson give us very clear definitions of the word "woman." And speaking of insulin, we eat "Twinkies" live on the air.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
